lead_paragraph: After the Battle of New Orleans, frontiersman John Breen turns West. The Duke puts on buckskin, saddles up and does what he can to protect hundreds of French army refugees from a greedy land baron.
snippet: After the Battle of New Orleans, frontiersman John Breen turns West. The Duke puts on buckskin, saddles up and does what he can to protect hundreds of French army refugees from a greedy land baron.
